free_courses.title: Generative AI - A Way of Life
free_courses.description: Embark on a journey into Generative AI for beginners. Learn AI-powered text and image generation, use top AI tools, and explore industry applications. Gain practical skills, understand ethical practices, and master prompting techniques.

free_courses.title: Getting Started with Large Language Models
free_courses.description: Dive into the world of Large Language Models (LLMs). Understand their architecture, applications, and how to fine-tune them for specific tasks. This course provides a solid foundation for working with LLMs.

free_courses.title: Building LLM Applications using Prompt Engineering
free_courses.description: This course offers a comprehensive guide on building LLM applications, mastering prompt engineering, implementing best practices, and developing chatbots using enterprise data with advanced techniques like few-shot or one-shot prompting.
curriculum: Introduction to Building Different LLM Applications

free_courses.title: MidJourney: From Inspiration to Implementation
free_courses.description: Explore the capabilities of MidJourney in generating creative content. Learn how to use this tool effectively to transform your ideas into visual representations.
curriculum: Using MidJourney for Creative Content Generation

free_courses.title: Building Your First RAG System using LlamaIndex
free_courses.description: Learn to build your first Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) system using LlamaIndex. Understand the integration of retrieval mechanisms with generative models to enhance information retrieval.

free_courses.title: Exploring Stability.AI
free_courses.description: Delve into the functionalities of Stability.AI. Learn how to leverage this platform for various AI applications and understand its impact on the AI ecosystem.

free_courses.title: Introduction to AI & ML
free_courses.description: Learn the current state of AI and ML, how they are disrupting businesses globally. Build a solid understanding of what AI and ML mean, what they represent in the current market and industry, how they work, and why you should learn about them.
curriculum: Building Blocks of AI and ML

free_courses.title: Introduction to Python
free_courses.description: Master the basics of Python with a detailed introduction to Python for data science analysts. Expand your skillset by learning scientific computing with NumPy.

free_courses.title: Machine Learning Certification Course for Beginners
free_courses.description: In this free machine learning certification course, you will learn Python, the basics of machine learning, how to build machine learning models, and feature engineering techniques to improve the performance of your machine learning models.

free_courses.title: The Working of Neural Networks
free_courses.description: This course will provide you with a hands-on understanding of Bagging and Boosting techniques in machine learning. By the end of the course, you will be proficient in implementing and tuning these ensemble methods to enhance model performance.

free_courses.title: Understanding Linear Regression
free_courses.description: This free course will help you understand the fundamentals of linear regression in a straightforward manner. By the end of this course, you will be able to build predictive models using linear regression techniques.

free_courses.title: Building a Text Classification Model with Natural Language Processing
free_courses.description: Learn how to build a text classification model using Natural Language Processing techniques. This course covers data preprocessing, feature extraction, and model evaluation.

free_courses.title: The A to Z of Unsupervised ML
free_courses.description: Get ahead of the crowd with this free course on Unsupervised Machine Learning Models. We will be covering popular clustering algorithms and DBSCAN and show you its applications on a real-world business problem.
curriculum: Applications of Clustering in the Real World

free_courses.title: Bagging and Boosting ML Algorithms
free_courses.description: This course will provide you with a hands-on understanding of Bagging and Boosting techniques in machine learning. By the end of the course, you will be proficient in implementing and tuning these ensemble methods to enhance model performance.

free_courses.title: Data Preprocessing on a Real-World Problem Statement
free_courses.description: This course will teach you how to handle missing values, outliers, and categorical data. Learn how to scale and normalize data and how to apply different preprocessing techniques to a real-world dataset.

free_courses.title: Advanced Python Programming for Data Science
free_courses.description: This course will take your Python skills to the next level, focusing on advanced Python techniques for data science applications. Learn about advanced data structures, data visualization, and more.

free_courses.title: Deep Learning for Beginners
free_courses.description: Deep dive into the world of deep learning. Learn how neural networks work and how to implement deep learning models using popular libraries like TensorFlow and Keras.

free_courses.title: Introduction to Computer Vision
free_courses.description: This course covers the fundamentals of computer vision, including techniques for image processing, feature extraction, and object recognition.
